entities.name: room
entities.description: The room is described as disordered and dusty with paper peeling from the walls and stains on the floor.

entities.name: furniture
entities.description: The furniture in the room is broken, suggesting that it was smashed.

entities.name: hallway
entities.description: A shadowy hallway is visible through an open door to the right of Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: Shrieking Shack
entities.description: Hermione thinks they are in the Shrieking Shack.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking around and noticing the broken furniture.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is frightened but nods at Harry.

relationships.description: Hermione is also in the room.
Harry can see the hallway through an open door.
Hermione thinks they are in the Shrieking Shack.
